channel.title: DataViz on Chico State DSI Blog
channel.description: Recent content in DataViz on Chico State DSI Blog

item.title: DSI seminar 2/14: Spatial is Special!
item.description: Logistics / Setup Presenter: Peter Hansen, Chico State GIS Specialist Date: Thursday February 14th, 2019 Time: 2-2:50 pm Location: Tehama 116 RSVP: http://goo.gl/forms/BnjV0y5zoz09tUU83 Description Are you curious about how to work with or create spatial data? Are you interested in beginning to explore how geographic data can be used in your research and other data inquiries? Data with a spatial component can be analyzed with software called GIS (Geographic Information Systems).

item.title: Workshop: Data Visualization with ggplot2
item.description: April is Data Fest Prep month! Hone your skills in preparation for this exciting data hackathon event! Logistics / Setup Date: Thursday April 18, 2018 Time: 3-3:45 pm Location: MLIB 442 Presenter: Robin Donatello: rdonatello@csuchico.edu Materials: R code (solutions will be posted after the workshop!) Details Are you new to R and want to learn how to make data visualization? Are you new to ggplot and want to understand more how the syntax works?

item.title: DSI Workshop - Data Visualization with ggplot2
item.description: Logistics / Setup Date: Friday April 21, 2017 Time: 3-4:30 pm Location: MLIB 442 Presenter: Robin Donatello: rdonatello@csuchico.edu [Workshop Details & Materials] Learning Objectives In this workshop you will explore data through visual tools using ggplot. You will learn how to plot different graphs.
